treatment-md.title: Digitipes kalewaensis Siriwut, Edgecombe, Sutcharit, Tongkerd & Panha, 2015, n. sp.
treatment-md.article-title: First record of the African-Indian centipede genus Digitipes Attems, 1930 (Scolopendromorpha: Otostigminae) from Myanmar, and the systematic position of a new species based on molecular phylogenetics
